karazhan.name: Karazhan
karazhan.description: The entry raid of TBC. Attunement is required to enter through the main gate.

steps.name: Arcane Disturbances
steps.description: Use Violet Scrying Crystal near underground water sources in the Master's Cellar

steps.name: Restless Activity
steps.description: Kill ghosts in the Master's Cellar to collect Ghostly Essences

steps.name: Contact from Dalaran
steps.description: Travel to Alterac Mountains to speak with Archmage Cedric

steps.name: Khadgar
steps.description: Deliver Cedric's report to Khadgar in Shattrath City

steps.name: Entry Into Karazhan
steps.description: Retrieve the First Key Fragment from Shadow Labyrinth

steps.name: The Second and Third Fragments
steps.description: Retrieve the Second Key Fragment from Steamvault and Third Key Fragment from Arcatraz

steps.name: The Master's Touch
steps.description: Take the restored key to Medivh in the Black Morass to activate it

ssc.name: Serpentshrine Cavern
ssc.description: Attunement was removed in patch 2.1.2 but the quest remains for the title reward.
ssc.note: Attunement no longer required for entry

steps.name: Reach Revered with Cenarion Expedition
steps.description: Required to purchase the Reservoir Key for Heroic Slave Pens access

steps.name: The Cudgel of Kar'desh
steps.description: Accept quest from Skar'this the Heretic in Heroic Slave Pens

steps.name: Obtain Earthen Signet
steps.description: Kill Gruul the Dragonkiller in Gruul's Lair

steps.name: Obtain Blazing Signet
steps.description: Kill Nightbane in Karazhan (requires summoning via Blackened Urn)

steps.name: Return to Skar'this
steps.description: Return both signets to Skar'this the Heretic in Heroic Slave Pens

tk.name: Tempest Keep: The Eye
tk.reward: The Tempest Key + Hand of A'dal title
tk.description: The Trial of the Naaru quest chain. Attunement was removed in patch 2.1.2 but the quest remains for the title reward.
tk.note: Attunement no longer required for entry

steps.name: Trial of the Naaru: Mercy
steps.description: Complete Heroic Shattered Halls before the Executioner kills the prisoners (timed run)

steps.name: Trial of the Naaru: Strength
steps.description: Obtain Kalithresh's Trident from Heroic Steamvault and Murmur's Essence from Heroic Shadow Labyrinth

steps.name: Trial of the Naaru: Tenacity
steps.description: Complete Heroic Arcatraz while keeping Millhouse Manastorm alive
steps.note: Keep Millhouse alive during final boss

steps.name: Trial of the Naaru: Magtheridon
steps.description: Defeat Magtheridon in Magtheridon's Lair

hyjal.name: Battle for Mount Hyjal
hyjal.description: Requires defeating the final bosses of SSC and TK. Attunement was removed in patch 2.4.0.
hyjal.note: Attunement no longer required for entry

steps.name: Reach Revered with Keepers of Time
steps.description: Required to start The Vials of Eternity quest

steps.name: The Vials of Eternity
steps.description: Accept quest from Soridormi in Caverns of Time

steps.name: Obtain Vashj's Vial Remnant
steps.description: Defeat Lady Vashj in Serpentshrine Cavern

steps.name: Obtain Kael's Vial Remnant
steps.description: Defeat Kael'thas Sunstrider in Tempest Keep: The Eye

steps.name: Return to Soridormi
steps.description: Return the vial remnants to Soridormi

bt.name: Black Temple
bt.description: The longest attunement chain in TBC. Attunement was removed in patch 2.4.0.
bt.note: Attunement no longer required for entry

steps.name: Tablets of Baa'ri
steps.description: Collect Ata'mal Tablets from Baa'ri Ruins (Aldor) or Netherwing Fields (Scryers)

steps.name: Oronu the Elder
steps.description: Speak with Oronu the Elder at the Altar of Sha'tar

steps.name: The Ashtongue Corruptors
steps.description: Kill 4 Ashtongue Corruptors in Shadowmoon Valley

steps.name: The Warden's Cage
steps.description: Speak with Akama at the Warden's Cage

steps.name: Proof of Allegiance
steps.description: Kill Zandras in the Warden's Cage area

steps.name: Akama
steps.description: Speak with Akama about his plan

steps.name: Seer Udalo
steps.description: Find Seer Udalo's remains in the Arcatraz

steps.name: A Mysterious Portent
steps.description: Return to Akama with news of Udalo's death

steps.name: The Ata'mal Terrace
steps.description: Retrieve the Heart of Fury from Shadowmoon Valley

steps.name: Akama's Promise
steps.description: Speak with A'dal in Shattrath City

steps.name: The Secret Compromised
steps.description: Speak with Seer Olum in Serpentshrine Cavern after Lady Vashj is defeated

steps.name: Ruse of the Ashtongue
steps.description: Slay Al'ar in Tempest Keep while wearing the Ashtongue Cowl

steps.name: An Artifact From the Past
steps.description: Retrieve the Time-Phased Phylactery from Rage Winterchill in Mount Hyjal

steps.name: The Hostage Soul
steps.description: Bring the phylactery to A'dal in Shattrath City

steps.name: Entry Into the Black Temple
steps.description: Speak with Xi'ri at the entrance to Black Temple

steps.name: A Distraction for Akama
steps.description: Help Xi'ri's forces create a distraction so Akama and Maiev can enter the Black Temple

heroicKeys.name: Heroic Dungeon Keys
heroicKeys.description: Reputation-based keys required for Heroic dungeon access. All require Honored reputation.

steps.name: Flamewrought Key
steps.description: Unlocks Heroic Hellfire Citadel dungeons (Ramparts, Blood Furnace, Shattered Halls)

steps.name: Reservoir Key
steps.description: Unlocks Heroic Coilfang Reservoir dungeons (Slave Pens, Underbog, Steamvault)

steps.name: Auchenai Key
steps.description: Unlocks Heroic Auchindoun dungeons (Mana-Tombs, Auchenai Crypts, Sethekk Halls, Shadow Labyrinth)

steps.name: Warpforged Key
steps.description: Unlocks Heroic Tempest Keep dungeons (Mechanar, Botanica, Arcatraz)

steps.name: Key of Time
steps.description: Unlocks Heroic Caverns of Time dungeons (Old Hillsbrad, Black Morass)
